"I see.":
"Commander, while Central City's
strategy has a different end goal in mind..."

"I would say it has many commonalities
with the strategy we had planned."

"...Kanui, fill them in
on our strategy."
"Understood..."

"We are currently conducting a large-scale
operation here in the Stia Region."

"It will involve suppressing and wresting control of
three DOLLS bases. The current stage is as follows..."

"...And that's the brief
outline of what we have planned."

"...So we're taking control of a DOLLS \"plant\"
and bases in the north and south..."

"And we're starting with
the capture of this plant..."

"Yes... It has very powerful
DOLLS protecting it..."

"Even we haven't been able to
totally capture the area thus far."

"With the enemy numbers as they are, we haven't been able
to completely wrest the area from their control..."

"But now we have you. I'd like to
make the best of this opportunity."

"The plan is to divert the attention of
the enemies in the facility with a forward party."

"Meanwhile, Commander Guren will lead our main forces
into the heart of the enemy base, and take it right out from under them."
"I'll have you three join our main forces, where I trust you'll make sure none of them get back up."
"Failure isn't an option. I will have this succeed, by any means necessary..."
"Understood."
"...Move out."
"Don't worry. You won't be without support out there. Let's move."
